website_summaries.verdict: With 100% boar bristles and an excellent design, it's the best brush in its class. Excellent results for thin, fine hair, but consumers with all hair types will appreciate the quality.
pros: Features all boar bristles and an ergonomic bamboo handle
Comes w/a bonus comb and storage bag
cons: Bristles are soft and closely set, so it takes a little effort to use on coarse, thick hair

customer_reviews.title: Received and used brush with hair tangled in bristles. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.text: Received a used brush! The brush has someone else's hair tangled in the bristles. The description said nothing about the brush being used and not clean. Even the box it came in was used and had grease stains on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This brush set is great. I originally purchased this brush for my young ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush set is great. I originally purchased this brush for my young daughter that has fine to normal hair. It works well for her hair type. I decided to use it my hair also. I have thick hair and it also worked well on my hair. It has made my hair shiny after using it for two weeks. I loved the personal details the packaging included. The set came in a nice linen drawstring bag with a handwritten note from the company. Dovahlia, please consider selling a boar bristle and nylon brush for those of us with thicker hair. I would be a repeat customer. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% Pure Boar Hair
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this brush, but sadly disappointed. It arrived with a number of bristles already falling out. Most importantly, it's very obvious that this is NOT 100% boar hair as advertised in the title and product description. There are nylon bristles mingled with the boar hair bristles. Tried it and it's much too soft to really go through my thin hair. All it did was create horrendous static. Would not recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I don't consider myself to have particularly thick/dense hair, but the bristles on this brush are so soft I was unable to get the brush to penetrate to my scalp. It really makes me wonder about all of the reviews about this brush ... also makes me realize that unless one is simply replacing an existing brush, then it's nearly impossible to buy an item like this online without trying it first ... I won't be trying this again, but instead will go to a local beauty supply store where I can actually touch the hairbrushes and get a feel for how stiff the bristles are ...
customer_reviews.author: ASOK

customer_reviews.title: Do not be fooled!
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY VERY low quality "soft bristle" brush. Do not buy if seeking high quality stiff boar bristle brush. This is not it. Huge disappointment! NOT worth the money by any stretch of the imagination!
customer_reviews.author: zero zero zero

customer_reviews.title: Ladies - if you have fine, thin hair - boar bristles are the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I've got the thinnest shoulder-length hair ever. Have been using your typical "de-tangling" plastic bristle brush and it always pulls and snags my hair. Then I discovered that the boar bristles on my round brush never snagged or got caught so I thought I'd try a straight brush with these types of bristles. PERFECT! The downside of this brush is that it doesn't feel comfortable in your hand. It's just stick-straight, if that makes sense. I didn't even want the comb or travel bag but couldn't find just a brush so got this set. For the money, I wish the brush felt better. At least it doesn't hurt my head though! Boar bristles from now on for me!
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, pay attention to the details, it says for fine hair and this brush is for fine hair so if you have thick hair don't buy. I love this seller, she included personal note, which is very sweet. The brush and comb came in a beautiful box and a bag. I use the comb on my toddler's hair, and loved it. I don't have very fine hair but I don't have very thick hair too, this brush works just fine on my hair and I like the feel of it on my scalp. Easy to hold and use. I would buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: SJVV

customer_reviews.title: Good for no-poo
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try no-poo since this quarantine kept my greasy head away from the public eye during the transition phase. My hair was looking flakey, oily, and gunky (as expected) until I got this brush. It distributes the oils SO WELL, and leaves my hair super soft. Three days ago I first used it to brush the ever-loving-hell out of my hair before "washing" with egg yolks. Afterward, my boyfriend couldn't stop touching my hair and saying how shiny it was. It's been 16 days since I last used actual shampoo, and because of this brush, I'm pretty sure my no-poo transition phase is over. I'm extremely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Circusmind

customer_reviews.title: Flattens hair
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was hoping. The bristles are short and it doesn’t really brush my hair, really flattens it (I have straight, medium texture hair). I wanted a boar bristle brush to distribute oils in my hair but I can really only use this if it’s going in a ponytail. I probably need to get a better quality brush but this was my entry level. Sephora makes a good brush that contains boar bristles and also plastic. I have the travel size, might go back to that.
customer_reviews.author: Brookworm

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR LONG HAIR
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing “no poo” for 2 months and needed a boars hair brush. I thoughts this was going to work for me but unfortunately it did not work out. The bristles weren’t able to help brush my natural oils all the way to my ends. I have long hair (bottom of shoulder blades). This is NOT a good brush for long hair. It made my mane frizzy. This would be better for a man or women with short hair. Liked the bamboo comb though. Unfortunately I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Ya it's all real 100% Boar bristles. Feels good on my scalp.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight brush made from bamboo. Detangling comb is sandlewood (I think) fairly thick, 3/8 in the back, tapers to 1/4 where the "points" are, all sanded nice and round, also feels good on my scalp, but I mostly use the comb to help clean my hair from the boar brush. The bristles actually STAY on the brush. I do have thinning hair, and I can see people with thick hair having a hard time getting the brush to make contact with the scalp, the brush's rounded nature helps breach the scalp better, though. Overall I have no regrets about the brush, or its price.
customer_reviews.author: Bread

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out all over the place.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because the ad copy said that the brush bristles will reach all the way to one's scalp. I have thin, fine, straight hair and the bristles never even got close to my scalp. The bristles, however did get close to the sink, counter and floor! They fell out left and right. Also, BEWARE! Despite all the ad copy about a family-owned business in Texas, this set is MADE IN CHINA. Returned set and got refund from Amazon. Note: I rarely write reviews and I have never given one star before, but this item struck out on three fronts. Sorry, Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Noticing.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, silky and healthy hair
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood brush and comb set that makes my hair look and feel silky. I’ve never had a boar bristle brush, so this is my first time using one. I was surprised at how long it took me to brush through my fine hair. But it’s supposed to make your hair shiny and soft by redistributing oil from your scalp and roots to the rest of your hair. So I have to brush longer due to the brush grabbing smaller amounts of hair. Now I can look acceptable with second day hair instead of an oil slick. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Lori Sue

customer_reviews.title: Static & bristles fall out
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this brush. Pros: cute and lightweight. Loved the wooden comb. I wanted to keep that Cons: it created static immediately & we have great in home humidity levels, bristles fell out first time I used & continued to fall out. I don’t beleive this is real boar bristles. The bristles we stuck into side of brush, poor crafting on that part.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald n Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't go through to the scalp even with thin, fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this brush. I have nerve pain on my scalp and brushes cause me pain. My hair is very short and average density in the back. It works on that part of my head but the bristles still don't touch my scalp. The top and side of my head has thin hair. The top is 2 - 3" long and there is no way to use this brush to style or even direct the under layers of my hair. I can't recommend this brush unless you have very short hair all over your head and ate just looking to brush it straight.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Cleans your scalp!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I started the water washing method and this was very necessary. It actually cleans your scalp. I will do this before bed with super oily scalp and in the morning my scalp isn't greasy at all!! Make sure to wash the brush regularly. I use Castile soap. I will spray essential oil water on the brush after i wash it and it transfers to my hair pretty well. The only problem is that I might not be using it right because I have had some breakage (i can tell because of fly aways).
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: and I was pleased. However
customer_reviews.text: The overall appearance of the brush was what it was advertised in the photos and the reviews, and I was pleased. However, I was underwhelmed by its performance. While it did help in giving my hair a more polished look, I found that the bristles collapsed very quickly under the heat of my blowdryer. I wish that the bristles were stronger so they could be more effective in stying my hair. Follow-up: they issued me a full refund, which I appreciate. And they did so immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost this a great brush with excellent customer service. And I love that this is a family run business. Always trying to support small business owners. Go to their website. They have a brush guarantee and very well-done videos to teach you how to get the most benefit from your brush. Plus it came with a wood wide-tooth comb that detangles your hair like a unicorn dream.
customer_reviews.author: B. Frayn Masters

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for this woman with “normal” hair!
customer_reviews.text: I gave 1 star because I have normal hair. I purchased this expensive brush b/c it stated it worked for women & normal hair. I am a woman with “normal” hair but this brush won’t go through my hair. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J Rittenhouse Salem OR

customer_reviews.title: Personal touches and a great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been shampoo & conditioner free for almost 2 years (using a combination of baking soda and vinegar) and 100% substance free (i.e. just water washing) for about 1 month. Brushes like this are imperative for healthy hair as the bristles naturally distribute oils throughout the hair to give it lovely body and shine. This brush and comb set is both beautiful and completely functional; throw in the personalized, hand-written note from the seller and we have a winner. Would highly recommend this product and any future dealings with this company.
customer_reviews.author: H. Schoonover

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush Doesn't Work Well For Thick Hair
customer_reviews.text: I returned this brush, but it wasn't due to quality or an issue with the brush itself. I have very thick hair. The boar's hair bristles are densely packed into this brush; which is great. However, the brush didn't go through my hair easily or at all. Unless I put a lot of effort into brushing it just sort of skimmed over the top of it. I ended up getting a boar's hair brush with pins in it from Target. Overall I would recommend this brush, just not for someone with thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new brush. This company gives you clear information on how to use the boar bristle brush and how to clean it. It comes with a linen bag (for traveling) and also a wooden fat-toothed comb to clean the brush or to comb through wet hair. I have fine hair with normal thickness, and this brush really brings out more shine and body. It also feels like a great scalp massage, possibly more hair growth. To be determined. I would highly recommend this brush. ( With the caveat that it is not at all similar to a plastic styling brush and that’s not its purpose.). I’m very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: MLCrooker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, high quality
customer_reviews.text: After using the comb and brush once a day(hair looks a little greasy till it absorbs sebum) for a couple of weeks it is increasingly evident how good this is for hair. I've noticed much softer and healthier looking hair as well as what seems like faster hair growth. Most surprisingly I've found my hair color change slightly to be more vibrant, though that could just be in my head XD The wood comb and boar bristle brush are both wuality products that seem like they will hold up for quite a while. It is worth mentioning that when cleaning wood combs you should use oil rather than water as water can apparently cause the wood to crack over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: My thin hair LOVES this brush!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hairbrush. I did a lot of research before buying a new hairbrush. I’m very careful with how I treat my hair after abusing it for so long in my teen years (sooo much Sun-In). After having my son my fine hair also started thinning out. So I’ve been very careful to use products and brushes/appliances that don’t damage it. This brush is perfect for me. Plus I love that it’s earth friendly with its wooden base! A definite win for anyone with thin hair who just wants a gentle but good brush.
customer_reviews.author: Caro Adele

customer_reviews.title: im so confused by the reveiws
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love it this brush, I was so excited by tall the review. I gave it an honest try and tried to make it work but I rather call it quits and get a new one. The bristles are not firm enough nor are they leveled or textured in a way that allows them to brush through your hair properly The brush also sheds like crazy. It just feels cheap and for the price i expect a little better quality. I rather spend a little more and get one that does the job.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Interesting-Brush Seems to Glide Over Hair and Smooth It Rather than Actually Brush It
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a boar's hair brush before and didn't exactly know what to expect. My hair is moderately curly and gets frizzy in humid weather. This brush does not exactly go thru all the strands of hair, altho it tends to smooth the outer surface for a while. Maybe it would be better for straight hair. It is very gentle-perhaps too gentle for my taste. I probably wouldn't buy it again, altho it was interesting to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: desert rat

customer_reviews.title: This comb is ALWAYS on me
customer_reviews.text: Whether my hairs getting tossed around in windy San Francisco, or im on the move road tripping or going from meeting to meeting, this comb has literally been by my side always. I bring it everywhere, cause it's light weight, slim and honestly makes my hair look flawless when it gets tangled up. It's hands down one of my favorite hair accessories and will only use this brush/comb combo from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice value - but beware it causes static!
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this brush would work well for me, but it did not work with my hair at all. As others have mentioned, using this brush made my hair poof out because of static electricity. I noticed a few bristles also coming out of the brush after a few uses. I am disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: mskile

customer_reviews.title: Attractive set and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought the comb was a little bigger and wish that it was. But it’s nice quality and the brush looks exactly like the picture which I was worried about. And it’s nice and dense yet soft and it made my hair a bit straighter. And it’s an attractive set I’m glad I bought this I’m trying to grow out my hair and switched to boar bristle. My hair is thin and fine which is what this brush was made for so it probably won’t work for others but it states it’s for thin fine hair
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: How Did I Forget This?
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality brush but I didn't realize it was a paddle style or I would have chosen differently. I haven't used a natural bristle brush in years, and the experience of having a quality brushing versus using the modern-day detangle brushes is wonderful. I always had a half-round brush before that seemed easier to use, but perhaps I will adjust to this flat style. Regardless, there is nothing to compare to a genuine bristle brush for luxury hair care.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Able to now brush fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Covair hair. Best way to describe my hair. I have fine wavy hair normally cut short. Because its so fine, I don't like to brush it because so many hairs come out. In the past, would put jell in it and scrunch it out. However, as the stay-at-home extended, and my hair became more unruly, I invested in this brush. With a few days of brushing, already noticing improvement in its shine and manageability. Best of all, I don't see strings upon strings of hair. This brush is perfect for my fine hair. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jylleallison

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love my comb and brush set. My boyfriend doesn’t use shampoo and I have him using the boar bristle as a secondary cleanser and he says it feels incredible on his scalp, and really pulls any excess sebum through the hair for a beautiful healthy shine. I do use shampoos for my hair but still use this to pull my oil throughout my hair and to keep my hair clean between washes. The comb is great, too. I use it more often as a detangler. I love the little sack as we travel/camp/road trip often.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I just received this brush and am a little disappointed. For the price, I expected a sturdier brush and comb. They're both incredibly light and feel sort of cheap. The brush works well enough, though it started shedding some bristles right away. Hopefully that won't continue. Given that the set is made in China, the markup must be incredibly high. I wasn't able to find out very much about the company. They don't seem to be registered in the state of Texas, but that may not mean anything. Overall, this brush and comb set is adequate but way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great boar bristle brush!
customer_reviews.text: I think when I got this the presentation was so nice! It comes in a burlap texture bag that protects the brush (which I leave the brush in when it's in the bathroom) and also comes with a wooden comb (great for wet hair!). My favorite thing to do in the morning is turn my head over and brush my hair upside down (so to speak). It leaves my hair with such a soft glossy feeling that it's like conditioner. Excellent quality brush that I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'd used the classic, expensive (you-know-which-one) boar bristle brush for years and it finally gave out. Just got this one today and It's a delightful replacement. Actually feels better and is more comfortable to hold -- at a fraction of the price. This is NOT the type you use to detangle hair after washing -- there are no plastic bristles sticking out. But it comes with a nice wooden comb for that purpose, and the natural bristles just make your scalp feel great and your hair shine when it's dry. It's relaxing to do the "brush your hair 100 times" when I get home from a stressful day at work and plop down to watch TV or read.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Even before I received this wonderful comb and brush set
customer_reviews.text: Even before I received this wonderful comb and brush set, I received an e-mail from Natalia, the company owner (with a helpful user guide attachment). This was a very nice, personal touch, which makes me feel special. The comb is perfect to detangle my wet hair without harsh pulling, and the brush is definitely good for my thin, delicate hair. I used to have very thick, full hair; but due to illness, my hair has thinned considerably. This brush is very gentle on my hair, as well as my scalp, but it is very effective. I believe this comb and brush set will be a wonderful tool in the overall treatment to get my hair back in shape.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneLai

customer_reviews.title: Love this bristle brush
customer_reviews.text: This type brush was recommended by my Hair dresser for my son's hair. He has fine and often unruly hair. This is his upgrade from his baby brush and I love it. Great quality. The bristles are soft but not too soft. I usually had to wet his hair in the morning to tame it. Not with this brush. One stroke and the hair is in place. It also makes my son's hair shine healthy. The comb is probably of no use to us since he has fine hair. I might use it. Overall great product and I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NicoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable customer service and care!! A++
customer_reviews.text: First off, the brush is great. The comb had a crack in one of the teeth and snagged your hair, it ended up breaking off. After reaching out to the company, they not only immediately replied with an apology, but they sent out a new comb and new brush(even though the brush was fine)! Impeccable customer service! New comb has been great, no cracks or issues. The brush is amazing, my daughters hair is so shiney!
customer_reviews.author: Erin C B

customer_reviews.title: Just what my hair needs
customer_reviews.text: My hair recently started shedding and thinning in the 'crown' area. It's also a tender area. My hair stylist suggested purchasing a Boar Bristle Hair Brush. I actually purchased two separate brushes. I liked the fact that the Dovahlia brush appeared to be more firm and that the set also came with a comb and the seller sent out a guide for tips. When I went to my recent appointment there was already a difference. I look forward to my daily brushing and the massage that my scalp feels.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Love this Brush
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dude with mid-length hair. This brush keeps your hair low the head (as opposed to other brushes I've had that puffs up the hair. I use a little bit of leave-in conditioner with it and it hasn't been a problem or had any buildup at all yet. I don't stand in front of the mirror brushing my hair for 5 minutes at a time, just a quick hit it and quit it for 30 seconds in the morning...if I overbrushed my hair might fall out as I'm nearing 50 years of youth. ;0)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A very well mages brush without the big cost!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this brush. The bristles are firmly in place inside the brush. My hair instantly looked smoother & felt so soft with one use. The presentation this small business company sent with this product is better than most of the bigger names. Will definitely look into purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Deinna

customer_reviews.title: Did not reach scalp
customer_reviews.text: I have thin hair but a full head of it. This brush did not reach my scalp at all. It just made what hair it could go through static filled. I gave it to my balding boyfriend and he likes it so at least there is some use for it. Edit: the company reached out to me and refunded the purchase. Very good customer service
customer_reviews.author: TaraCap

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading natural bristles are good for one’s hair. I do like this set and appreciated the sweet note from the seller. It’s not a large brush or comb, but I like the size because it’s better for travel. The only reason I gave it four stars is because some of the bristles fall out when I use it. I am not accustomed to using natural brushes, so if this is normal, then I would give this five stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a company with yesteryears standards
customer_reviews.text: This brush is fabulous and changed the condition of my hair from day 1. Gentle soft and moisturizing. I’m trying to grow out my hair and stop coloring so it’s been damaged and dried out. This brush is the answer who knew. Don’t hesitate to support this fabulous company with the customer service of years be gone. How refreshing
customer_reviews.author: Aqua Moon

customer_reviews.title: The best hairbrush and comb
customer_reviews.text: I love these products. I have thinning hair and what a difference brushing my hair. I can throw out my six different varieties of hair brushes. I am so happy with the products that I bought two more for my daughter and granddaughter. My daughter is happy with hers because it distributes the natural oil of her hair. My granddaughter is also happy because she has a very sensitive scalp and hair that tangles easily
customer_reviews.author: Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I love the customer service this company provides. Without me even asking they wrote me an email telling me that my brush was on its way and also helpful tips on how to use it to get the maximum results. Love this company not a lot of people take their time to do nice things like this. Also the packaging was beautiful. Will be ordering again for gifts for people since they are so beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the brush and I really like it, my hair definitely feels silkier and fuller after a couple months of using it weekly. I've never been a comb person but I figured since it came with the brush I'd try it. and omg! I love it! Now I only brush my hair with this comb and when I'm about to shower and my hair is getting a bit oily I use the brush! Love them both and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comb, brush is a lint collector
customer_reviews.text: Love this comb and brush, they truly do wonders for my type 2C hair (especially when combined with shampooing using a bar rather than store-bought shampoos). The little bag they come in is nice and protects the brush from a lot of dander, but it still seems to collect lint like it's going out of style. It's also difficult to pull out shed hair from the bristles without pulling out the bristles themselves. Overall, the product works great and I think it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: cait

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it, my hair loves it .
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first and noticed this brush was making my hair more frizzy , turn out O was not using it properly, once I folled the instructions from seller/Google I noticed considerable difference, would definitely recommend to use a little bit of coconut oil if your ends are damaged like mine ,it will help keep your hair hydrated and tame the frizz . I bend at the wait and brush, then detangle again and section my hair ,I brush each small section 5 times and then once it's all been brushed I put my hair up for a bit to give it a waiver look .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't pull out my hair when hitting a knot and it is pain free making my 6 year old love this brush as well
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I have thick long hair so as advertised it takes a little longer to do my hair but it is totally worth the extra effort. It doesn't pull out my hair when hitting a knot and it is pain free making my 6 year old love this brush as well. My hair is shiner and has less split ends and more volume since using this brush. Then funny thing is I was just looking for a natural bamboo comb not a brush but this for the price I thought why not get the brush as a bonus and I'm so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Great brush and comb set
customer_reviews.text: My hair and scalp thank you! The brush and comb meet all my expectations. I was going to get a hair cut but since I have your brush and comb set I have decided to keep my long hair! Thank you for a brush that is a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Elna Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have short hair (pixie cut) so I can't elaborate in detail on how this brush has made an amazing difference in my hair, but it is a good quality brush (well made) and it's nice that the bristles aren't cheap plastic (I'm pretty sure that's what I had as a kid?). Feels nice to brush with, for sure (very relaxing).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The brush is also awesome. It took some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: I'd never tried a wooden comb before, nor an actual bristle brush, so I wasn't sure what to expect. This turned into a pleasant surprise. Unlike plastic combs, the wood doesn't catch or snag on my hair (long & fine-textured), and it undoes tangles a lot easier than plastic combs. The brush is also awesome. It took some getting used to, as I'd only used plastic-bristled "styling brushes" before. This brush is much gentler on the hair and feels so much better on my scalp. I wish I'd bought these years earlier!
customer_reviews.author: MinorAgentofChaos

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Brush!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my boar brush in the mail and already love it! It is beautiful and you can literally feel the quality in your hand and the bristles in your hair. It comes with a really nice wooden comb as well (good to use for wet hair) and an adorable little pouch for storage. The bristles feel gentle, yet have a good good grip. This is a very good price guys. 👌🏻 I am happy with this product. :) I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: XYZ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not great at brushing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this brush a couple of months now. The quality is good, and it travels very well. I, however, have fine long hair. It does great on the hair near the scalp, and keeps it great looking. However, it doesn't like my ends, and they get very fuzzy with this brush. I'm at the point where I may not use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Romany

customer_reviews.title: Static magnet
customer_reviews.text: Once again I cried after using a product. How can I say static? My hair got plugged to my skull and made that swosh sound of static. No .... I totally spent a lot of money and beginning to question my purchases. This brush is oh so pretty but useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Quality brush set
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very high quality brush with a nice set (comb, bag)! It does distribute my oils better than my wet brush alone. I just wish I could clean the brush without worrying about soaking the handle, but that’s a small price to pay for the sustainability of bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good brush for the price
customer_reviews.text: Brush seems to be holding up well. Boar bristle brushes are a must for when you don't wash your hair every day. Makes my hair shiny, works well too for slicking back flyaways when I want to put my hair up. Only compliant is it not being made in the USA, but I did know it was made in China before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Williams

customer_reviews.title: It is rather small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this brush for use at home. Was disappointed by the fact that the head of the brush is rather small. The wood portion is also rather thin. See photo that clearly shows my old brush, bigger, thicker and sturdier, compared with this one. I will keep it for use in the glove compartment of my car. It would also work as a purse brush. Would not buy it again. With so many brush options, it is very hard to compare them unless the dimensions are clearly indicated in the tech. info.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Franco

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This brush has completely changed the look and feel of my hair. I have fine hair that usually looks stringy and greasy unless it has been recently washed. After just a few days I've noticed an improvement in the texture and body of my fine hair. It looks cleaner for longer inbetween washes and has started to look more wavy/full. I am in love with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marlee Horchen

customer_reviews.title: Hair feels soft!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve struggled to find great hair products to get my hair healthy. I have very fine straight easily-breakable hair. This brush is helping it to feel smooth and seems like it’s making it much healthier! I can’t wait to see how long it will grow using this!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great 100% boar brush, wooden comb is hard to use
customer_reviews.text: The brush is great. I don't wash my hair every day now and it is much shinier and the ends are much less dry than before. I had to search high and low to find a brush that is truly 100% boar bristle and this one fits the bill. I found that the wooden comb was hard to use and not helpful in detangling my hair. I think it had to do with how thick it is, the gap between the teeth and the texture of the wooden surface. I was OK with that since I have a plastic wide-toothed comb I use already.
customer_reviews.author: ojosverdes

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this brush and it was a great one! It really distributes all the oil from ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brush and it was a great one! It really distributes all the oil from the top to the bottom and my hair has definitely been improving. Also I appreciate the time that the company takes to make you feel special. When I got my package I got a handwritten note and it was very lovely. Overall great brush would definitely recommend it for anyone looking into a good boar bristle brush.
customer_reviews.author: ashley s.

customer_reviews.title: Great product & company!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I love adding these two brushes into my daily routine. I’ve already seen improvement in my hair texture in the short time I’ve had it. The comb is a great edition, and I love it just as much as the brush. The travel bags are a nice addition too! The creators also reached out with instruction on how to use their product, and it was so helpful! I will definitely look into more products of theirs again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Walker

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but not the best
customer_reviews.text: I have to section my hair when I use this brush, because the bristles do not allow my hair to go all the way in, so it stays mainly on the surface. It helps with frizz, and distributes the oil in my hair, but I will buy a higher quality boar brush in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love my shiny hair!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Dovahlia brush set and am very happy. Each time I brush my hair (dry of course), my hair is super shiny and silky. The set comes with some helpful hints too, which was appreciated. I am trying to grow out my hair so I did some research on how to keep my hair healthy. I kept reading that using a boar bristle brush helps our natural oils from the scalp reach the rest of the strand.
customer_reviews.author: BW581

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BRUSH for DRY HAIR
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I wash my hair too often because it gets oily from the day and from working out but this brush genuinely disperses oil down the ends of my hair and keeps it healthy looking. Great find and happy with this boar bristle hair brush. Nice packaging and comb addition.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Healthy hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second boars hair brush I have purchased. I have thin hair, but a lot of it, so when I use this brush, I do have to section it off. I’m also dealing with a lot of static still, but my hair feels so much softer! I’ve also gotten quite a few more complements on the health of my hair lately and the new brush is the only change to my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Johnl1982

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush! I have really fine/thin hair, it makes it look fool and soft without tearing out a bunch of hairs like my old brush did. Since the bristles are so dense and short it doesn't permeate through many of the hairs, but I think that is why it doesn't pull them out also. Comes with a cute little comb for that detangling. I love the little bag it comes in too!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Its terrible it's super rough it doesn't make my hair smooth at all and when the brush came it had brown hair on it like if someone used it and I have dirty blonde hair. Amazon I want a full refund cause I am not gonna waist my time and my money to return this damn thing so amazon you better give me a refund. The stupid brush makes my hair super oily after just brushing it a few times and I just washed my hair and it gives my hair static. TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.author: Geraliz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't reach scalp, just brushes over hair.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is nice and the bristles seem durable. But even with my very fine and thin hair, this brush doesn't reach my scalp at all. It brushes over my hair rather than going through it so it has no use to me whatsoever. Whole point I got this brush was to distribute natural hair oils throughout my hair but the brush doesn't even touch my scalp. I guess you need to have extra thin and fine hair to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality Boar Bristle Brush set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful brush and comb set. Both are well-made, sturdy and attractive. I have fine gray hair that breaks easily and this brush is perfect. It's gentle on my hair and yet adds volume and shine. The comb works well to eliminate knots. Don't be disturbed if you initially get lots of static. I did at first but this went away with daily brushing as suggested in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair fluffy/frizzy - weak bristles
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t what I was looking for. Brushed top layer of hair but no knots, and made my hair really fluffy/frizzy. I do like the comb for the shower
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Gives a shine and is a nice brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush actually gives my hair a nice shine. I was debating between getting a kent brush but thought the price point was too high so i got this. I actually bought another one for work. Contrary to the marketing a man can actually use it without any dire consequences.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P

customer_reviews.title: The only brush to own!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush and comb set. The comb is perfect for wet hair, untangling without damaging my thin, fine hair. The brush is perfect to give my hair lift and volume. I threw my other brushes away and will never go back!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Blogger

customer_reviews.title: bristles are too short and too soft
customer_reviews.text: brush is not as described-might be useful for a child with with soft, thin hair. Brush is not substantial enough for soft, medium texture short hair with no curl. Would not order again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: libbie

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst hair brush that I have ever bought for my husband. All the bristles are coming out. This is nothing but trash - do not waste your money on this item. I would give it a zero if it was available.
customer_reviews.author: sailors01

customer_reviews.title: My hair feels so nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got it a couple days ago and really like it so far. My hair is starting to be softer, and it's not as frizzy anymore. The comb is great, and really helps with all the knots. They are right when they say brush in sections. The bristles can't penetrate through a huge amount of hair, so you'll have to take your time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well with fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and this brush still struggles to brush through it. I was hoping it would work but I feel like I just wasted my money on this brush. It is well made I’ll give it that I just wish it would work with my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a brush like this forever, and am so happy to finally find one! My only wish is that they'd also make a smaller travel version. Otherwise everything about it is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Ian

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, thin, blonde, medium length with a bit of waviness, that gets oily easily so I have washed my hair every day my whole life. I'm trying to transition to washing less often and having a more natural approach to hair and skincare, and this brush and comb works wonderfully for me. Every night, I comb out the tangles, then take my time brushing out my hair. Yes, it may take some time, but I've been doing it for almost a month now and my hair feels healthier, stronger, and softer, and less oily. I also noticed that the amount of hair fall has decreased dramatically. I 100% recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Blythe Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The brush does not go through my hair easily. I have medium length, fine, thin hair and have to brush it in one inch sections, and even that is difficult. The brush is too big and bulky to get close to the roots except along the edges (hair line, nape of neck).
customer_reviews.author: Dayna D

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This brush was supposed to be better for you if you lose hair. I have never experienced this much shed with a brush and my hair is not tangled. It also started losing bristles. It seems very cheap. Need to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying brushing my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this hair brush for so many reasons! First, my fine hair is not "pulled" or broken. Second, feels environmentally conscious. And, i enjoy the bristles on my scalp. Just feels good, so i am brushing my hair the recommended time.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Brush
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a boar bristle hair brush, because I had heard it would help my hair. So far it is what I hoped it would be. I can't say if there is improvement yet in my hair since I only received it recently, but it is a beautiful brush and feels great going through my hair and scalp.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: BUY NOW!  Especially i f you have long, thick hair like I do.
customer_reviews.text: I am crazy about this brush! With my long, thick hair I found it impossible to brush without static and frizz until I found this boat bristle brush. I love it! My hair is shinier than ever and never frizzy or tangled. I am going to purchase a second now that I know how great this brush is!
customer_reviews.author: I Am BULLISTIK

customer_reviews.title: Best brush/comb set ever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brush and comb set. I have long looked for the perfect natural bristle brush and I will never go back to anything else after having this. I also super love the demo video they provide, as I have definitely enhanced my brushing technique because of it. It’s been 2 weeks of use and my hair is already softer and it’s keeping root volume better too. I have long, fine, thin-ish hair that is delicate due to heat styling. This is the perfect brush/comb set for my hair type.
customer_reviews.author: colleen biri

customer_reviews.title: Pulled some hair out
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Amazing customer service. The company sent out a replacement with bristles that works wonderful with my hair. They even wrote a note which I thought was great. I like the comb, but the brush doesn't work with my hair. It just seems to rip it out, even though I bought it based on its advertised compatibility for my hair type. I untanged my hair before using, so the brush wasn't going through knotted up hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Like better than more expensive brush
customer_reviews.text: I have chin length fine but not thin hair, this works much better than a $150 brush I had previously. Have washed brush a few times, do not notice any bristles falling out. Would recommend this 100% boar bristle brush. .
customer_reviews.author: Empty Nest

customer_reviews.title: I actually enjoy the brushing process
customer_reviews.text: After using my Boar Bristle Hair brush for several weeks I have definitely seen an improvement in the way my hair looks and feels. I actually enjoy the brushing process! The seller really is unusual, giving much information about how to use the brush, and following up with the buyer. I have ordered another set just like this one to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen of DE

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in bristle loss.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like an acceptable brush but I am disappointed. It was delivered 5/15 am I cleaned the hair out today 5/21 and I had what seems to me to be an excessive amount of bristle loss. While long, my hair is super fine and should not be putting much tension on the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Less static, happy hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brush for him, the comb for her. We’re happy. He’s been happily brushing his hair each morning with this brush and seems pleased. She’s been soaking the comb in camellia oil overnight and combing that through her hair winding up with fewer tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Halsted

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. It helps tame frizz and also helps untangle hair. I use it in the evening sometimes and sometimes before hair wash to untangle hair. I also use it on dry hair sometimes to tame frizz. I haven't traveled with it yet, but it has been helpful on the run for everyday life.
customer_reviews.author: Zoya

customer_reviews.title: Soft and gentle on hair, with no static.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good hairbrush and comb. I have never owned any boar bristle brushes, and using them made a quite good change. These bristles are gentle on your hair, and they never get pulled or have adverse effects on hair roots from combing. I use this twice a day, no instances of static developed on hair, and makes it easier whenever my hair suffers from velcro-effect The wooden wide toothed comb is perfect for after shower hair drying and sorting. No instances of static developed in my hair from these too. The finishing is real good, ergonomic and at a moderate price, well worth buying for.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hairbrush. Great experience.
customer_reviews.text: Not too soft not too stiff. I have thin hair with a small bald spot. The hairbrush I use scratched that spot and left me with a healing scab. I think this boar hairbrush will not do the same. It is well made and feels good in hand. It keeps hair shiny by mixing scalp oil with hair. I am quite satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality overall
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very well made with strong yet soft bristles. They feel great on the scalp. My only complaint is that I find it very difficult to get the brush past the top layer of hair. This is either because the bristles are too short or maybe placed together too tightly. I can’t tell which. My hair is on the finer side, so I did purchased the right type. I find that the only way I can get it through my hair is if I brush it in very small sections, which adds a lot of time to the brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Missie K

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic set, both the brush and comb are great. After a year of use they are holding up well. I use the comb almost every single day and I see fewer split ends because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this brush. I had no idea that this was how great my hair could be. I have thin, fine hair and it is prone to getting greasy quick. I always that by brushing it, the grease would make my hair worse off but actually my hair looks healthier and shinier. I l appreciate how my hair doesn't lose it's voume from combing it.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great comb, Decent brush
customer_reviews.text: I use this comb several times a day but the brush only once a day when my hair is completely dry. I tried following the instructions once (flipping hair over and brushing) but the tangle created were terrible and took quite a while to comb out. My hair is very fine and thin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Best brush/comb set I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to grow my hair out and this brush is helping me get through the awkward stage. It has brought shine and body to my hair. The customer service is excellent, even sending instructions on how to get the best use of the brush. I just bought a second brush to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Boar Bristle Hair Brush Set for Women and Men - Designed for Thin and Normal Hair - Adds Shine and Improves Hair Texture - Wood Comb and Gift Bag Included (black)
feature_bullets: ★ UNLIKE OTHER BOAR HAIR BRUSHES FOR WOMEN THAT ARE too weak to reach past the surface of your hair, our scalp brush is the real deal for thin hair. TRULY MADE FROM 100% PURE BOAR’S HAIR, our boar bristle brush was DESIGNED WITH THICK BANDS OF BOAR BRISTLES that reach straight through to your roots to REDISTRIBUTE YOUR HAIR’S NATURAL OILS throughout your hair, CONDITIONING ROOT TO TIP giving your natural hair a beautiful shine complements of Mother Nature.

★ OUR NATURAL BAMBOO & BOAR BRISTLE BRUSH IS built to last, with NO NYLON FILLERS THAT scratch your scalp and NO UNPLEASANT SMELL. Only PURE, HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS GO into each and every boar brush. We take care to QUALITY CHECK EVERY BRUSH TO ensure they meet our high standards.

★ EACH SOFT BRUSH & WOOD COMB SET INCLUDES A washable hemp travel bag, boar’s wooden brush & wooden comb. The WOODEN DETANGLING COMB works as a wet brush detangling brush for use after bathing. Once hair dries, use your boar’s hair brushes for women to STIMULATE THE SCALP’S NATURAL OILS, KNOWN AS sebum, and brush through your hair FOR A SILKY, SMOOTH SHINE. The perfect hair brush for men & hair brushes for women alike.

★ We spent 2 years conducting market research TO DISCOVER THE BEST BRUSH FOR your fine to medium textured hair. Our pure boars bristle hair brush was born from that journey. In our boars hair brush, you have a hair brush boar bristle that WON’T PULL YOUR HAIR OR SCRATCH YOUR SCALP, BUT is gentle and GIVES YOUR SCALP & HAIR A NATURAL CONDITIONING USING A TECHNIQUE THAT has been used for centuries.

★ WE STAND BEHIND OUR BOAR BRUSH HAIR BRUSH. As a small family business, we personally use our boar bristle brush for women every day. We love our customers & work closely with suppliers TO ENSURE THE LASTING QUALITY OF OUR BOAR BRISTLE BRUSHES. If, for any reason, you aren’t absolutely in love with your pure boar bristle brush, REACH OUT AND WE WILL MAKE IT RIGHT.
